content.title: State Agriculture Thesis Grant for M.Sc. Agriculture
content.details: The scheme 'State Agriculture Thesis Grant for M.Sc. Agriculture' was launched by the Department of Agriculture, Government of Nagaland to provide a Thesis Grant to all the inhabitants of Nagaland who passed the M.Sc. Agriculture programme under the State Plan of Education & Training.
benefits: Under the scheme, the Thesis Grant will be given to students according to the course/programme in which they are enrolled.
eligibility: The State Agriculture Thesis Grant will be applicable for all the inhabitants of Nagaland who passed the M.Sc. Agriculture.
Applicants must be from an Institution which has a valid AISHE/UDISE code.
Applicants must not be a beneficiary of any other scholarship scheme.
content.application_process: Online - via CSCs. All eligible students shall apply through the Common Scholarship Portal: https://scholarship.nagaland.gov.in
documents_required: Copy of the front page of the Bank Passbook or Bank Statement (clearly indicating the Account Holders Name, Account Number, Bank Branch, IFSC Code, link with Aadhaar, etc.)

faqs.question: Who is eligible to apply for this thesis grant?
faqs.answer: The State Agriculture Thesis Grant is applicable to all residents of Nagaland who have successfully completed their M.Sc. Agriculture program.

faqs.question: What are the benefits of the State Agriculture Thesis Grant?
faqs.answer: The Thesis Grant will be given to students according to the course/programme in which they are enrolled.

faqs.question: Can I apply if I'm pursuing my M.Sc. Agriculture degree?
How will the grant amount be disbursed?
faqs.answer: The grant amount is directly credited to the bank account provided by the applicant during the application process.

faqs.question: What is the significance of the AISHE/UDISE code requirement for applicants?
faqs.answer: Applicants must be enrolled in institutions that possess a valid AISHE/UDISE code to qualify for the grant.

faqs.question: Can applicants who are beneficiaries of other scholarship schemes apply for the State Agriculture Thesis Grant?
faqs.answer: No, applicants must not currently be benefiting from any other scholarship scheme to be eligible for the State Agriculture Thesis Grant.

faqs.question: How to apply under the scheme?
faqs.answer: All eligible students shall apply through the Common Scholarship Portal: https://scholarship.nagaland.gov.in

faqs.question: Can I edit my application after submission?
faqs.answer: No, once an application is submitted, you cannot make changes. Ensure all information is accurate before submitting your application.

faqs.question: How can I track the status of my scholarship application?
faqs.answer: Log in to your account on the portal and/or navigate to the 'Track Application' section. You can check the status of your application there.
